name: Squats
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Lunges
description: Start in a plank with a straight body, lower your chest by bending your elbows, then push back up to plank.

name: Planks
description: Hold body in straight line from head to heels, supporting weight on forearms and toes.

name: Pull-ups
description: Hang from bar with arms extended, pull body up until chin clears bar, lower with control.

name: Burpees
description: Squat down, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump feet to hands, jump up with arms overhead.
